ban.title: You have been **BANNED**
ban.description:
If you want to do a ban appeal, you need to do a ban appeal 

You need to read Foxy's [ToS](https://foxybot.win/terms)

messageCreate.hello: Hey, I'm Foxy! My prefix is `/ (Slash Commands)`, use `/help` for help!

interactionCreate.commandError: Unfortunately, an error has occurred when trying to run this command, sorry <:foxymedu:890688173951315988>, the error also was sent to the developer <:foxysunglasses:890688144280784926>

error.title: An error has occured while running `{{cmd}} command` command! This error was sent to the developer.
